name: First World Problems
overview: As in the movie "Falling Down" starring Michael Douglas, our young character is armed with a hunting shotgun and lots of ammunition, in addition to having a monumental anger, when he realizes that the SEOR courier that had to send you a state-of-the-art phone in 24 hours, it wasn't doing its job and they had your package held up somewhere. Days ago, he had acquired a J-Phone 22 through an internet page, hoping to receive it within the promised period through the aforementioned transport company. Days pass and the package did not arrive. Every phone call to SEOR's customer service only made him feel more heated by the evasive and false promises of the company. In a moment of fury, he decides to take justice into his hands and go find his package in the warehouses that the company owned several blocks from his house, be that as it may.
